name: Attack on Calamity
description:
Upgraded Version based on the old game Attack on Cataclysm:

https://carthagea.itch.io/attack-on-cataclysm

Added:

  • Dialogue System for the new cutscenes
  • New wave system based on time
  • new enemies (Lizard, crocodile, Alligator, Bats, Human Knight)
  • Balanced weapons with Infinite Level up system
  • added sound-effects on menus and text and other stuff
  • polished visuals and particle effects
